channel.title: Runtime Exception Error
channel.description:
So I was editing max hits of a few bosses for my server and then compiled all my work flawlessly. When I run the server, however, I get this message and cannot log in to my server without instantly losing connection over and over again. I have checked around the locations it says and am finding nothing out of place. Any ideas?
[code=java]OldskoolPk Server. Original source: DeltaScape Oh Snap It's on!!! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2049) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:111) [/code]

item.title: Runtime Exception Error
